name: Immunity Warrior
description:
Be the last hope against the virus infection. Enter the aftermath of virus cells trying to take over the human body.

Immunity Warrior is a top-down action shooter game challenging your combat skills in a human organ environment. Descend deeper into the human body and explore the infected levels. 

Armed with a gun as your main guidance, you will always be on your toes trying to survive and combat with the cells!

MISSION

Your objective is to eliminate all the virus cells, free the hostage cells and collect the key in order to prevent them from spreading to different parts of the body.

Immunity Warrior has 10 levels to explore with increasing difficulty. As you progress through the levels, the enemies will spawn in higher numbers and will require quick, agile skills to be eliminated.

ARSENAL

Gather pickups like shield and health to aid your gameplay.

KEY FEATURES

· Top-down action shooter

· Dual stick touch controls

· Beautifully rendered lighting and shadows

· Special Powers to enhance your gameplay

· Vibrant Environments
